Gourgeist (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0710: Pumpkaboo
Pokémon
#0712: Bergmite →

Gourgeist has been featured on 5 different cards since it debuted in the XY expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Gourgeist cards are normally Psychic-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Gourgeist

Gourgeist
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Gourgeist XY 57/146 Collection Y 028/060
Noivern Half Deck   2/30        
        XY-P Promotional cards   XY-P
Gourgeist Phantom Forces 45/119 Phantom Gate 044/088
        Premium Champion Pack   063/131
Gourgeist Crimson Invasion 45/111 Awakened Heroes 025/050
Gourgeist Evolving Skies 077/203 Skyscraping Perfection 017/067
        VSTAR Universe   062/172
Gourgeist Paradox Rift 078/182 Future Flash 030/066


This article is part of Project TCG, a Bulbapedia project that aims to report on every aspect of the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
